name: CTRL/CMD+K - Only highlights one match if multiple channels with same name

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
1. Create a channel with the same name as a username
  2. Use CMD/CTRL+K to open the quick switcher
  3. Start searching for the channel with the same name as a username
inline.expectedResult: • Single preselection appears on the first channel matching the search term (rather than both channels being highlighted as selected)
